bibl.title: P. Giss. 69: Evidence for the Supplying of Stone Transport Operations in Roman Egypt and the Production of Fifty-Foot Monolithic Column Shafts.
bibl.note: P. Giss. I, 69, its implications for our understanding of the prestige stone supply, and the date of the Temple of the Deified Trajan in Rome.
Peña J. Theodore, P. Giss. 69: Evidence for the Supplying of Stone Transport Operations in Roman Egypt and the Production of Fifty-Foot Monolithic Column Shafts.
